game.name: Fitness Workout Xl
game.description:
Fitness Workout Xl game is specifically for the people that have especial choice for people that are completely fitness freak and gym enthusiast. In this version of performing sports game online there by heading from one fitness machine to another to get a perfect body shape. You will be able to change the background of the game as well too. There are total eight backgrounds of the games to be acquired and purchased for paying 1000, 1500, 2000, 3000, 5000, 7500 and 10000 coins.

However, when doing exercise in the gym a strict diet plan and exercise routine is required to be followed. When the moon symbol shows 0% then it means that you have exhausted a lot during the course of exercise and need to take rest to the fullest till it becomes 100% once again.

Plate symbol showing the symbol of 0% indicates that you are hungry and need further energy to do exercise. Different food items give different level of energy on paying certain number of coins. For example water bottle gives 5% energy paying for 20 coins, whereas Noodles filled 50% cost is 100 coins, carrots filled 40% energy and cost 80 etc.

In this fitness workout?game there are total 6 machines and number one is offered to you unlocked. Your appearance also changes from level 3 after doing all the repetitions. In each of this free online game there are levels to score and enjoyed.
game.metaTitle: Fitness Workout XL, Performing Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Fitness Workout XL is the performing game for the fitness freak and gym enthusiast that wish to mould their body in exact shape and size.
